by.horant.fintask.service

Interface ClientService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientServiceImpl

    public interface ClientService
    The user of this interface undertakes to implement client interaction with the application by implementing such methods as authorization and registration. Authorization implies passing as login and password parameters. Registration implies passing an object of the RegistrationData class as a parameter.
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User authorization(java.lang.String userEmail, java.lang.String userPassword)
      The method of user authorization in the system.
      User registration(RegistrationData userData)
      The method of user registration in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • authorization

        User authorization(java.lang.String userEmail,
                   java.lang.String userPassword)
            throws ServiceException
        The method of user authorization in the system. It returns an object of authorized user.
        Parameters:
        userEmail - user email using for authorization in the system.
        userPassword - user password using for authorization in the system.
        Returns:
        an object of authorized user.
        Throws:
        ServiceException

      • registration

        User registration(RegistrationData userData)
           throws ServiceException
        The method of user registration in the system. It returns an object of registered user.
        Parameters:
        userData - an object of the RegistrationData class, which includes data from registration form.
        Returns:
        an object of registered user.
        Throws:
        ServiceException
